statements: SELECT * FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE id = 1
SELECT energy_savings, emissions_reduction FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE resource_conservation > 0.5
SELECT * FROM Ewaste_Recycling ORDER BY emissions_reduction DESC
SELECT id, energy_savings, emissions_reduction, resource_conservation FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE id IN (2, 4)
SELECT AVG(energy_savings) AS avg_energy_savings FROM Ewaste_Recycling
SELECT id, energy_savings, emissions_reduction, resource_conservation FROM Ewaste_Recycling ORDER BY energy_savings DESC, emissions_reduction ASC
SELECT id, emissions_reduction, resource_conservation FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE energy_savings > 500 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE id = 3 OR id = 5
SELECT id, emissions_reduction FROM Ewaste_Recycling WHERE resource_conservation > 1000
SELECT id, energy_savings, emissions_reduction, resource_conservation FROM Ewaste_Recycling ORDER BY energy_savings ASC
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_activities;
SELECT activity_id, energy_savings FROM ewaste_recycling_activities ORDER BY energy_savings DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM recycling_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_activities WHERE emissions_reduction > 0.5;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM recycling_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_activities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM recycling_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT activity_id, energy_savings, emissions_reduction FROM ewaste_recycling_activities WHERE emissions_reduction > 0.5;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM recycling_facilities ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_activities WHERE resource_conservation IS NOT NULL AND energy_savings > 50;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM energy_savings
SELECT date, amount, id FROM emissions_reduction
SELECT reduction_amount, date, location FROM emissions_reduction WHERE reduction_amount > 100
SELECT date, amount_saved, resource_type FROM resource_conservation WHERE amount_saved < 50
SELECT * FROM energy_savings WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM energy_savings WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM emissions_reduction WHERE reduction_amount < 50 AND location = 'California';
SELECT location, reduction_amount FROM emissions_reduction WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT id, resource_type, amount_saved FROM resource_conservation WHERE resource_type IN ('Water', 'Electricity') AND amount_saved > 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM energy_savings ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_savings ORDER BY date_saved DESC;
SELECT id, energy_saved FROM energy_savings WHERE energy_saved > 10000;
SELECT date_reduced, emission_reduction FROM emissions_reduction WHERE emission_reduction < 0;
SELECT resource_name, amount_saved FROM resource_conservation ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT activity_name, location, date_started FROM recycling_activities WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM resource_conservation ORDER BY amount_saved DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM recycling_activities WHERE date_started >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_started;
SELECT id, energy_saved FROM energy_savings WHERE energy_saved > 1000 AND recycling_activity_id IN (SELECT id FROM recycling_activities WHERE location='City Center');
SELECT r.resource_name, e.emission_reduction FROM resource_conservation r JOIN emissions_reduction e ON r.recycling_activity_id = e.recycling_activity_id WHERE r.amount_saved > 500;
SELECT MAX(energy_saved) AS max_energy_saved, MIN(energy_saved) AS min_energy_saved FROM energy_savings;
SELECT * FROM energy_savings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT date, energy_saved FROM resource_conservation WHERE material_saved > 1000;
SELECT efficiency_rating, energy_saved FROM energy_savings WHERE efficiency_rating >= 3;
SELECT id, co2_reduction, pollutant_reduction FROM emissions_reduction WHERE co2_reduction > 50;
SELECT * FROM recycling_activities WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM energy_savings ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, energy_saved FROM energy_savings WHERE efficiency_rating > 80
SELECT date, co2_reduction, pollutant_reduction FROM emissions_reduction WHERE co2_reduction > 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT material_saved, waste_reduction FROM resource_conservation WHERE material_saved > 50 AND waste_reduction > 20
SELECT activity_id, impact_type, impact_value FROM impact_tracking WHERE impact_type = 'energy'
